about.title: Explore Samarkand and Beyond
about.lead: Travel to Uzbekistan’s Samarkand — where ancient culture meets modern hospitality. SamTour offers safe, unforgettable historical journeys.
about.mission_desc: We connect travelers to the true soul of Uzbekistan, from Samarkand’s blue-tiled mosques to the old streets of Bukhara and Khiva. We believe every journey is a story — and we help you create yours.
about.expertise_desc: Our guides know the famous landmarks and hidden treasures of Uzbekistan.
about.personalized_desc: Every itinerary is designed around your interests, schedule, and dreams.
about.support_desc: Reach us instantly via Instagram, WhatsApp, or Telegram — we’re always here.

samarkand.title: Samarkand
samarkand.desc: The heart of the Silk Road. Explore Registan, Gur-e-Amir, and Shah-i-Zinda — every tile tells a story.

tashkent.title: Tashkent
tashkent.desc: The modern capital of Uzbekistan — a blend of contemporary architecture, vibrant bazaars, and deep traditions.

khiva.title: Khiva
khiva.desc: A living museum inside ancient walls. Walk through Ichan Kala and feel time stand still.

bukhara.title: Bukhara
bukhara.desc: The spiritual and scholarly heart of the Islamic world — home to ancient mosques, madrasahs, and caravanserais.

shahrisabz.title: Shahrisabz
shahrisabz.desc: The birthplace of Amir Temur. Visit the remains of the Ak-Saray Palace and follow in the footsteps of the great conqueror.

about.cta_desc: We will design a trip you will remember for a lifetime. Discover the ancient soul of Uzbekistan with us.

services.title: Our Services
services.lead: Travel through Uzbekistan with SamTour — comfortable, personalized, and unforgettable experiences await.

private_tours.title: Private Tours
private_tours.desc: Exclusive trips designed to meet your needs. Private groups, personal guides, and complete flexibility.

historical_journeys.title: Historical Journeys
historical_journeys.desc: Discover Uzbekistan’s timeless wonders — Registan, Shah-i-Zinda, Ulugh Beg Observatory, and more.

photo_tours.title: Photography Tours
photo_tours.desc: Capture Uzbekistan’s unique landscapes with a professional photographer. Memories guaranteed.

custom_packages.title: Custom Packages
custom_packages.desc: We design special routes based on your schedule, budget, and interests.

nationwide_travel.title: Nationwide Travel
nationwide_travel.desc: From Tashkent to Bukhara, Khiva to the Fergana Valley — we travel all over Uzbekistan.

cultural_immersion.title: Cultural Immersion
cultural_immersion.desc: Experience Uzbekistan’s rich culture through local cuisine, traditions, and hospitality.

services.regions_desc: We operate tours in Uzbekistan’s most famous destinations. Wherever you want to go — we’re there.
services.cta_desc: Not sure where to go? Contact us today — we’ll plan something special for you.
